mapper.insert: insert into schedule(sd_time, sd_date, sd_mo_num, sd_sc_num) values(#{sd.sd_time}, #{sd.sd_date}, #{sd.sd_mo_num}, #{sd.sd_sc_num})
mapper.select: select mo_title, sc_num, sd_date, sd_time, th_name, ti_num from schedule join movie on sd_mo_num = mo_num join screen on sd_sc_num = sc_num join ticket on sd_num = ti_sd_num join member on ti_me_id = me_id join theater on th_num = sc_th_num where me_id = #{id};
